    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void testAddGroup()
      This method should test that a SiteManager adds a group to its internal list of groups and returns true.
      (package private) void testAddGroupAlreadyExists()
      This method should test that a SiteManager adds a group to its internal list of groups and returns true.
      (package private) void testAddMember()
      This method should test that a SiteManager adds a member to its internal list of members and returns true.
      (package private) void testAddMemberAlreadyExists()
      This method should test that a SiteManager adds a group to its internal list of groups and returns true.
      (package private) void testGetActiveGroups()
      This method should test that a SiteManager returns a list of the n groups who have the most activeness (questions asked + answers posted), sorted on activeness, highest first.
      (package private) void testGetActiveGroupsNGreaterThanTotalGroups()
      This method should test that a SiteManager returns a list of all groups, sorted on activeness, highest first.
      (package private) void testGetActiveMember()
      This method should test that a SiteManager returns a list of the n members who have the most activeness (questions asked + answers posted), sorted on activeness, highest first.
      (package private) void testGetActiveMemberNGreaterThanTotalMembers()
      This method should test that a SiteManager returns a list of all members, sorted on activeness, highest first.
      (package private) void testGetGroup()
      This method should test that a SiteManager returns a specific group given the title of that group.
      (package private) void testGetGroupDoesNotExist()
      This method should test that a SiteManager returns a null when there is no group in the list of groups with the given title.
      (package private) void testGetGroups()
      This method should test that a SiteManager returns a list of all groups in its internal list of groups, sorted on title.
      (package private) void testGetGroupsByText()
      This method should test that a SiteManager returns a list of all groups in its internal list of groups where any part of the title or description matches a particular string, sorted on title.
      (package private) void testGetMember()
      This method should test that a SiteManager returns a specific member given the email address of that member.
      (package private) void testGetMemberDoesNotExist()
      This method should test that a SiteManager returns a null when there is no member in the list of members with the given email address.
      (package private) void testGetMembers()
      This method should test that a SiteManager returns a list of all members in its internal list of members, sorted on last name then first name.
      (package private) void testGetMembersByText()
      This method should test that a SiteManager returns a list of all members in its internal list of members where any part of the first name, last name, screen name, or email address matches a particular string, sorted on last name then first name.
      (package private) void testGetPopularGroups()
      This method should test that a SiteManager returns a list of the n groups with the highest number of members, sorted on number of members, highest first.
      (package private) void testGetPopularGroupsNGreaterThanTotalGroups()
      This method should test that a SiteManager returns a list of all groups, sorted on number of members, highest first.

      • testGetMembersByText

        @Test
void testGetMembersByText()
        This method should test that a SiteManager returns a list of all members in its internal list of members where any part of the first name, last name, screen name, or email address matches a particular string, sorted on last name then first name.

      • testGetPopularGroups

        @Test
void testGetPopularGroups()
        This method should test that a SiteManager returns a list of the n groups with the highest number of members, sorted on number of members, highest first.

      • testGetPopularGroupsNGreaterThanTotalGroups

        @Test
void testGetPopularGroupsNGreaterThanTotalGroups()
        This method should test that a SiteManager returns a list of all groups, sorted on number of members, highest first. The parameter given to getPopularGroups(int n) is greater than the total number of groups in the list. This should not crash.

      • testGetActiveGroups

        @Test
void testGetActiveGroups()
        This method should test that a SiteManager returns a list of the n groups who have the most activeness (questions asked + answers posted), sorted on activeness, highest first.

      • testGetActiveGroupsNGreaterThanTotalGroups

        @Test
void testGetActiveGroupsNGreaterThanTotalGroups()
        This method should test that a SiteManager returns a list of all groups, sorted on activeness, highest first. The parameter given to getActiveGroups(int n) is greater than the total number of groups in the list. This should not crash.

      • testGetActiveMember

        @Test
void testGetActiveMember()
        This method should test that a SiteManager returns a list of the n members who have the most activeness (questions asked + answers posted), sorted on activeness, highest first.

      • testGetActiveMemberNGreaterThanTotalMembers

        @Test
void testGetActiveMemberNGreaterThanTotalMembers()
        This method should test that a SiteManager returns a list of all members, sorted on activeness, highest first. The parameter given to getActiveMembers(int n) is greater than the total number of members in the list. This should not crash.
